subject: Simsonn pedals F1 2025
description_text:
Hi team,

I'm having trouble getting F1 2025 to recognise my brake pedal inputs.

It can see that I'm pressing the brake but it does not brake or show any
brake pedal in calibration. The accelerator works perfectly.

Do you have any tips to help me with this?

I've used your software and simhub software.

I'm eager to get this working and show my friends how good your pedals are.

Kind regards,
Bill.

conversations.body_text: Hi Bill E,  You can adjust the offset in the software, which will shift all pedals’ white signals close to 0%, and then recalibrate the pedals.
